Message.Msg: Pay Pal is believed by RBC Capital to have the ability to grow its EBITDA at a 20.9 percent compound annual growth rate through 2020. The firm keeps an Outperform rating and raises its target to $57 from $47 on the stock. Should have raised it to $60 by X-mas
